function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on CO2 data for inferring the risk of airborne infection","Impact":"Inaccurate risk assessment and potential misinterpretation of the infection likelihood","Mitigation":"Use multiple parameters to assess airborne infection risk, not just CO2 data","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, occupancy sensors, and ventilation monitoring systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, public health officials","Owner":"Building owners, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainties in values for quanta generation rate and viral load","Impact":"Inaccurate risk assessment and potential underestimation of infection likelihood","Mitigation":"Regular updates of quanta generation rate values for different activities and viral load, continuous monitoring of virus characteristics","Technologies":"Virus sampling and analysis technology, real-time data collection systems","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Use of a novel disease with limited data and experience","Impact":"Increased uncertainty and potential for misjudgment of infection risk","Mitigation":"Continuous research and data collection, collaboration with global health organizations for data sharing","Technologies":"Global health data sharing platforms, research databases","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, global health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, global health organizations"}]}
